channel.title: CVE Feed for Docker -- Docker Desktop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Docker -- Docker Desktop

item.title: CVE-2024-8695|2024-09-12T19:14:03.622Z -- docker -- docker%20desktop
item.description: A remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability via crafted extension description/changelog could be abused by a malicious extension in Docker Desktop before 4.34.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-8696|2024-09-12T19:27:18.773Z -- docker -- docker%20desktop
item.description: A remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability via crafted extension publisher-url/additional-urls could be abused by a malicious extension in Docker Desktop before 4.34.2.
